sentences.sContent: Moen shared her son's story in front of the Senate Environment and Public Works Children's Health subcommittee today.
sentences.sContent_eng: Moen shared her son's story in front of the Senate Environment and Public Works Children's Health subcommittee today.
sentences.sCn: 今天，在参议员环境和公共事务儿童健康小组委员会前，摩恩分享了她儿子的故事。

sentences.sContent: This committee ideally should be a subcommittee of an enterprise level governance committee.
sentences.sContent_eng: This committee ideally should be a subcommittee of an enterprise level governance committee.
sentences.sCn: 理想情况下，这个委员会应该是企业级治理委员会的子委员会。

trans.tranCn: 小组委员会；委员会的附属委员会
trans.tranOther: a small group formed from a committee to deal with a particular subject in more detail
